about_the_game:
Introducing My Fly, a pilot gaming application for desktop. This innovative program offers an immersive and thrilling experience, designed to equip aspiring pilots with the skills and knowledge needed to conquer the skies. With realistic checklist procedures, self-paced learning, interactive aircraft controls, and real-time feedback, this application takes gamified learning to new heights.

Procedures Included:

  • Aircraft Introduction, demonstrated overview of a fixed wing aircraft indicating important specifications and limitations at a basic level of instruction in a third person perspective.

  • Preflight Inspection, beginning the normal procedures of a walk-a-round inspection in a first person perspective with guided visual highlights, instructional narration and text, and real time interactions of simple and visual selections. 

  • Timed Preflight Inspection, a complex mode of the preflight inspection in a first person perspective with real time interactions that are unguided and timed. 

Freeplay Flight:

  • Aircraft is positioned at the base of the runway before engine start, this mode is preset with key bindings to gamify the maneuvers and flying.

  • Real-time instrument feedback for attitude indicator, airspeed indicator, altitude, directional gyro, engine RPM, turn coordinator, and vertical speed indicator.

  • Real-time flight control surface feedback and lighting designated to aircraft specifications and limitations.

  • Unlimited aircraft repositions and fuel, no penalty for crashing or depletion of fuel.

Whether you're a beginner or an experienced pilot looking to enhance your skills, this desktop application provides a safe and convenient platform to practice maneuvers, navigate checklist familiarization, and develop critical decision-making abilities. Get ready to embark on an exciting journey towards becoming a skilled aviator, all from the comfort of your own computer. So don your headset and prepare for takeoff with this exceptional pilot gaming ​​​​​​​application for desktop!
